thread.section_title: Laguna Pearl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laguna Pearl | lagunapearl.com
thread.title: Arnold Sheldon
thread.title_full: Laguna Pearl reviewed by Arnold Sheldon

author: Arnold Sheldon
title: Arnold Sheldon
text: The pearls look great and the service was very good. I would suggest that they consider using the leatherette case for all orders over say $500. The small extra cost would be more than offset by the improved quality impression from this nice box rather than a cardboard one.
